title: Shopping Bag, "First Issue"
creditline: Gift of Eric Ettlinger and family in memory of his cherished wife, Lyse
description: Recto: "FIRST ISSUE" in large black font centered on natural brown paper;  at right, four blocks of identical blue cubes and white postage stamps, with a First Issue American Design postmark (logo design). Cancellation lines continue in one side panel.

tombstone.epitaph: Shopping Bag, "First Issue". Paper; black cord handles.. Gift of Eric Ettlinger and family in memory of his cherished wife, Lyse. 1993-45-18.
